1298920.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Token Pack 01 - Desert Warriors
1298920.description:
Jans Token Pack 01 - Desert Warriors

Desert Warriors.
30 tokens, both male and female for use in your desert environments.
This product includes:
  • Female Axe
  • Female Bow
  • Female Blow Leather Armor
  • Female Burning Hands Mage
  • Female Crossbow Leather Armor
  • Female Dagger
  • Female Mace Shield Scale Mail
  • Female Spear
  • Female Staff
  • Female Sword Shield
  • Female Sword Shield Chainmail
  • Female Two Handed Sword Plate Armor
  • Female Two Swords
  • Female Two Swords Chainmail
  • Male Axe
  • Male Bow
  • Male Bow Leather Armor
  • Male Burning Hands Mage
  • Male Crossbow Leather Armor
  • Male Dagger
  • Male Fireball Mage
  • Male Lightningbolt Mage
  • Male Mace Shield Scale Mail
  • Male Spear
  • Male Staff
